metadata.title: USN-6497-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Maxim Levitsky discovered that the KVM nested virtualization (SVM) implementation for AMD processors in the Linux kernel did not properly handle x2AVIC MSRs. An attacker in a guest VM could use this to cause a denial of service (host kernel crash). (CVE-2023-5090)  Alon Zahavi discovered that the NVMe-oF/TCP subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle queue initialization failures in certain situations, leading to a use-after-free vulnerability. A remote attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-5178)  Budimir Markovic discovered that the perf subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle event groups, leading to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-5717)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6497-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-oem-6.1-headers-6.1.0-1026 - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-headers-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-tools-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-buildinfo-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-image-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-oem-6.1-tools-6.1.0-1026 - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-modules-ipu6-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-modules-ivsc-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-modules-6.1.0-1026-oem - 6.1.0-1026.26 linux-oem-6.1-tools-host - 6.1.0-1026.26 No subscription required  linux-tools-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-headers-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-headers-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-headers-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-image-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-image-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-image-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-image-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-tools-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-tools-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-tools-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-headers-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1026.27 linux-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1026.27 No subscription required
